title: Encore: 'What Am I Hearing?'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Ever wonder what instrument you're hearing during your favorite 'Circle Round' story? We're revisiting a very special episode featuring the music and mind of Eric Shimelonis, resident sound designer and composer.
itunes:author: WBUR
